name: legacy_workflow_passthrough
description: Legacy Workflow Passthrough Pipeline: Direct execution of complete ComfyUI workflows from legacy server

meta.description_en: Legacy Workflow Passthrough: Direct execution of complete ComfyUI workflows
meta.note: For complex legacy workflows that cannot be decomposed into DevServer chunks. Uses complete workflow JSON with title-based prompt injection.
meta.todo_2026: Refactoring planned for Spring 2026: Move execution logic from backend_router into pipeline itself
